showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Most important for me tonight, the shower/bathroom was spotlessly clean; big deal for a trucker away from home. ‚Ä¶

Don't stop here if you like being stuck in the driveway for 20minutes. The water in the shower is back and fourth warm for a couple minutes then cold for way longer. Hardly any parking just pass this place up unless you are actually out of ‚Ä¶

I always get up two hrs before my break is up to shower and get ready but I spent and hours waiting for a shower from 2 am to 4 am now I'm late to my appointment they had opened dirty showers and no one care to clean them up ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ thank you ‚Ä¶

As a full time on the road traveler, what a wonderful shower. $12, all in one private toilet, sink, and large shower. Not a lot of room in terms of the "dry space" but managed just fine. Doesn't lower my rating. Oddly didn't earn any ‚Ä¶
Clean shower ,laundry, mcdonald's on site,clean not to big,so far the nicest truck stop,although I'm cargo van driver,not semi truck
Stopped here for a hot shower and this Pilot did not disappoint. Hot water and ready quick. Staff were friendly and helpful. Recommend.

‚Ä¶ a ProPhil pilot flying J cup. He followed my husband around the store like he was a criminal. He refused to give us an extra towel for our shower. I shower with my husband when Im on the road with him. We will not be returning to this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ affect until 4 PM the next day. Went into the shower in the morning , my company is calling saying wesley the manager is calling saying I wasn't  on the property and he was threatening to tow my truck. I was going to pay for the next ‚Ä¶
Friendly staff, CLEAN showers! $12 for a shower. A washcloth, small, and large towel are provided. All in one soap is also provided inside the shower. Would visit again.
Cleanest truckers shower I have been in. Would give them 5 stars if there was more tractor trailer parking.

showerReviews.reviewText: Right here it‚Äôs a not real TA. Look here shower room. Super clean and new. The most clean TA shower rooms ever. The driver will got nice morning and one night right here . Two minutes walk Dunkin and McDonald . Thanks Lawrence nice clean ‚Ä¶

I came on 02.29.25 at 12.10 pm to get a shower. Tried to book it through the TA app but the app gave me an error and took my shower credit. I went to the fuel desk and Jasmine refused to give me a shower, knowing they had a problem with the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in comparison... So I pulled in here on Monday afternoon... Slept like a baby because their lot is pretty dark... And then I got up and took a shower on Tuesday (today). $14. It was very clean and it felt oh so good! Employees are all very ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ area, I cannot give them 5*. Way too many paid parking spaces sitting empty when people spending hundreds on fuel would love to be able to log a 30 minute break and go eat or maybe grab a shower. What good are points and showers when you ‚Ä¶

Apparently management wants to save in electricity bills light goes off during a shower and I got a guard at the door when I go out !!!! Do their business go out ??? They act like that marking all parking spots as reserve trying to get ‚Ä¶
This facility as of today has broken shower locks in which the porter didn't think enough to take it outta service for maintenance July 30 2025, 17:07

I come here and I book the shower and am waiting before the last 1 hour and they dont have any shower and also dont have empty waiting chairs we are stand here before 1 hour dont come here and the staffs very unfriendly behavior

I try to get a shower at 1:00 am there was not showers ready the fuel desk lady told me they  work on it cleaning but there was not truckers taking showers at this time , they point is if not Bory taking showers at this time why is a ‚Ä¶

Showers were out of service. If they were under construction or doing remodeling, they should of had at least one or two showers in working order as much money as the drivers pay to park and shower. Terrible service.

‚Ä¶ at this truck stop this morning. They were using the bathroom and found mold on the floors. They could actually smell it. Plus, they found hair on the shower wall.  I'm sorry. Truck drivers deserve better. They do a lot for this country

showerReviews.reviewText: The cleanest Flying J in a while. Huge truck parking area & very spacious. Everyone inside was nice, friendly and welcoming. ‚Ä¶

I love the coffee and the employees.  Very friendly and courteous staff.  A lot of construction going on but overall it's well stocked, clean, food is fresh, hot and ready and Cinnabons are always fresh and hot in the morning.

Trucks park everywhere they want , blocking the in and out entrance. Shower and convenience store  were clean . They use the driver‚Äôs lounge as a stock room . Truck drivers dump their trash all over the parking. ( no surprise).

Update: After reading the other reviews and seeing that flying J‚Äôs corporate office really could care less about the discriminatory behavior & cleanliness, I will be contacting my lawyer & the health department. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice clean location to park, refresh and refuel you and the truck!  Nice bathrooms, no shower.  Great seating area with plenty of plugs to charge device.

Clean, with a verity of options in the store. Cashier needs to work on her customer service skills. Ok place to refuel and rest for the truckers. If you‚Äôre looking to shower, you won‚Äôt find it at this location. Limited parking for truckers.

‚Ä¶ for a restart on Sunday. I deliver on Monday. This place has no showers. Since there are no showers i decided to talk to a manager about dropping my trailer and going to the YMCA to work out and shower.  Manager got on this power trip ‚Ä¶

How dare you rob the American trucker Don't waste your money on this place I mean if you have to sleep and get fuel and a shower fine fine but they are absolutely double charging the amount it would cost for anything else

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Calling it a Petro is misleading. Has the same amount of truck spots as a ta or ta express. Doesn't have a iron skillet and only has 5 showers. The staff seems friendly and the place seems clean but all they have is a popeyes. There's some hotels in the area and an ihop.
Like every Petro location, place is clean, many parking spots available staff is friendly

We stopped here super early - 5:15 am. Clean outside, clean store inside and a very clean restroom! Both the men's room (and from Mrs. K., the ladies) were super clean. No papers on the counter, no water on the floor, clean smell. Fabulous. ‚Ä¶

This is By Far the nicest Petro we have ever stopped in for gas! The customer service is very kind and professional, the store is nice, neat and clean and the restrooms are very nice and clean. We are transporters and frequently stop at truck stops. This one is impressive- 5 stars deserved!!

This place is one of my favorite places to stop on the way from Florida. There's a huge selection of hand made candies, fudges, and last minute state gifts. The restrooms were clean. Most importantly the staff is always super polite. I love this place.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Totally clean showers the people here will help you out no matter what the center is located outside the town so it's very clean and the staff is very friendly and they'll accommodate you whenever you need something. Pilot Travel Centers ‚Ä¶

Happened to be on the road and needed a shower. Quick and fast service. The young lady opened my door, clean and sanitary. Towel and wash rag provided, I carry my own so I didn‚Äôt use the provided items. When I say hot water, expect it! It ‚Ä¶

Fuel pumps not working with cards, they charge to park, they don't accept shower credits from pilot points, but the showers are closed and don't have towels anyway. The store is fairly clean and the cashier's are friendly though. Wouldn't ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Afternoon. I‚Äôm a lady trucker. My husband and I team drivers. Looking for over night parking and showers. This ‚Äúthing‚Äù that was working tonight was very rude. Told us if we were looking to shower she will have to charge us for two. We asked ‚Ä¶
Good to see remodel and new parking. But staff sucks. Was in shower total 20 minutes. 5 of that was waiting on hot water. Then staff comes knocking to rush you out! Says others are waiting. ‚Ä¶

On 10/13/2024 at approximately between 2:30 pm- 3:00pm . I walk in requesting to use my pilot points to take a shower . The three ladies that were at the front stated that we do not give out showers to truckers . The reason was because the ‚Ä¶

Very nice people there! My husband, 10 month old daughter, and I stopped by to shower on our way back to Pittsburgh after thanksgiving down there with my dad. We only paid 12$ to shower, it was amazing clean, and the ladies in the front ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ were covered in diesel so I guess everybody has to come in and was thinking hands. I can't believe they expect truckers to shower in that filth and pay for it. I do want to like pilots and flying J and we did have a great experience in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for every fraction of a penny.  That kind of business doesn't encourage a return visit.  Based on previous reviews, I'm glad I didn't try to shower here.  To management, if you don't disinfect, shower shoes or not, we get nasty foot fungi ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that the place is in.. make sure you bring some kind of disinfectant and plenty of paper towels to wipe the showers down with because they are absolutely disgusting and they are using dirty water just to run a mop through things they are ‚Ä¶
